item.title: Considering a PhD? A guide based on my personal experience.
item.description: Prior to starting my PhD back in the early months of 2019, I remember spending long evenings on Google, Quora and Reddit, looking for people who shared their opinions and perspectives on the big life decision I was facing in the time: “Should I go to grad school and start a PhD programme?”. At that time, I was just about to finish my Masters degree in Nanotechnology back in Czechia, and have also just returned from nearly a year-long stint at ICFO (Institut de Ciències Fotòniques) in Catalunya, Spain, where I did my Masters project and wrote my MSc. thesis.
